code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{getSearchResultStyle}from'../styles/SearchStyle';export function createSearchResults(symbolsArray,content,setResults){var tempResults=[];if(content.length===0){setResults([]);return;}var contentToSearch=content.toUpperCase();var leng=symbolsArray.length;for(var i=0;i<leng;i++){var symbolElement=symbolsArray[i];if(symbolElement.notation[0]===contentToSearch[0]||symbolElement.description[0]===contentToSearch[0]){if(symbolElement.notation.includes(contentToSearch)||symbolElement.description.includes(contentToSearch)){tempResults.push(symbolElement);}}}setResults(tempResults);}export function produceChartData(symbol,symbolData){if(symbolData.highest===undefined){return{};}var weekDays=['Monday','Thursday','Wednesday','Tuesday','Friday'];var labels=[];for(var index=0;index<symbolData.lowest.length;index++){labels.push(weekDays[index%5]);}var dataClose={label:'Average Prices',data:symbolData.close,fill:true,borderColor:'blue'};var dataHgh={label:'High Prices',data:symbolData.highest,fill:true,borderColor:'purple'};var dataLow={label:'Low Prices',data:symbolData.lowest,fill:true,borderColor:'red'};var title={label:symbol,data:[],fill:true,borderColor:'black',borderWidth:'12'};var chartData={labels:labels,datasets:[title,dataLow,dataClose,dataHgh]};return chartData;}export function mapSearchResults(data,setSymbolData){function createResultElement(symbol,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onMouseDown:function onMouseDown(){setSymbolData(symbol);},style:getSearchResultStyle(),children:[symbol.description,"(",symbol.notation,")"]},index);}return data.map(createResultElement);}
